original_text: And the sons of Merari by their families; Mahli, and Mushi. These are the families of the Levites according to the house of their fathers.
korean_text: 므라리의 아들들은 그들의 종족대로 말리와 무시이니 이는 그의 종족대로 된 레위인의 조상의 가문들이니라

sentences.original_text: And the sons of Merari by their families
These are the families of the Levites
according to the house of their fathers
